titleStmt.title: The Christian life wheren is shew'd, I. The worth and excellency of the soul. II. The divinity and incarnation of our Saviour III. The authority of the Holy Scripture. IV. A dissuasive from apostacy. Vol. V. and last. By John Scott, D.D. late rector of St. Giles's in the Fields.
Christian life. Vol. 5
titleStmt.author: Scott, John, 1639-1695.
White, Robert, 1645-1703, engraver.
Zouch, Humphrey.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for S. Manship and R. Wilkin, and are to be sold by W. Davis at the Black Bull in Cornhill, and J. Bonwick at the Hat and Star in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The portrait of the author is signed: R. White sculp.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
